com.amazonaws.mobile.client

Class AWSMobileClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.amazonaws.mobile.client.AWSMobileClient

  • public final class AWSMobileClient
extends java.lang.Object
    AWSMobileClient is a high-level SDK client that initilalizes the SDK, fetches Cognito Identity and creates other SDK client instances. 
      To initialize the SDK, invoke the initialize(Context)
  method:
 
  AWSMobileClient.getInstance().initialize(this);
 
  To get a callback when the initalize is successful, invoke the
  initialize(Context, AWSStartupHandler) method.
 
  AWSMobileClient.getInstance().initalize(this, new AWSStartupHandler() {

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AWSMobileClient.InitializeBuilder
      InitializeBuilder accepts and retrieves the optional parameters necessary for initializing the AWSMobileClient to work on.
      class  AWSMobileClient.SignInProviderConfig
      The wrapper class for SignInProvider class and the permissions necessary for provider.
